EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CTO_6_CS_Video
EmailTemplate.subject: Find out how successful CSPs have deployed secure service enablement from Nokia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Watch how Nokia has transformed CSP networks New technology deployments often require trade-offs between operational efficiency and flexibility. With Secure Service Enablement – including our SBC, DRA, and AAA – our clients are delivering on both, without compromising one for the other.
See their deployments results. Click the link below to view the case studies:
- Tier 3 operator secures and scales VoLTE infrastructure with Nokia SSE - Converged operator increases capacity, enables new services with Nokia SBC - Mobile operator offers new IMS services, grows revenue streams with Nokia CSD - Converged operator consolidates IP services to Nokia AAA Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
